channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:23 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:23 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast follow further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
